data.message: Hi, my husband is locked out of his Facebook account of 9 years because he's stuck behind a security check page, confirmation codes aren't arriving, he can't report the page as disabled because it's not disabled, he's tried contacting Facebook via twitter for the past four days with no reply, how can he get this resolved please? I contacted you on Messenger with his information.

replies.message: Hi Nataska. If you are having trouble verifying your account with a mobile code, please fill out a report in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2x2swt1. -Ashley

Hi, thank you for the reply, my Husband submitted that form already on Monday and nobody has replied, he has now submitted it for a second time, how long does it usually take to receive a reply please?
Hey Nataska. If you have reported this issue to our team, hang tight while we take the time to review the situation. Thank you for your patience. -Ashley
Facebook  I am waiting 10 days. How long takes to solve this problems nobody can answer...
كيفة احصل على اشارة زرقاء لفيسبوك
Hi Sniega. If you have already submitted your ID, hang tight while we take the time to review the situation. Thanks for your patience. -Ashley
How many days I've been waiting
